items.title: Notice: Lynemouth Power Station: agreement between DESNZ and EP Lynemouth Ltd
items.summary: Government has agreed Heads of Terms with Lynemouth Power Station.

items.title: Guidance: UK ETS: Activity level report template
items.summary: For operators to use to submit activity level reports to their regulator.

items.title: Guidance: Training on export control compliance
items.summary: Courses, seminars, workshops and webinars to help exporters understand their obligations under export control legislation.

items.title: Make Work Pay: modernising the Agency Work Regulatory Framework
items.summary: We are seeking views on proposals to improve the framework which governs the temporary labour market to better protect workers while minimising business burdens.

items.title: Official Statistics: Preference utilisation of UK trade in goods: technical annex
items.summary: Technical annex for the statistics on the UK’s utilisation of tariff preferences for imports and exports under preferential trade agreements (PTAs).

items.title: Official Statistics: Preference utilisation of UK trade in goods, 2023
items.summary: Statistics on UK utilisation of tariff preferences for imports and exports under PTAs for 2023, including trade in goods between Great Britain and the EU under the TCA.

items.title: Official Statistics: Preference utilisation of UK trade in goods, 2022
items.summary: Statistics on UK utilisation of tariff preferences for imports and exports under PTAs for 2022, including trade in goods between Great Britain and the EU under the TCA.

items.title: Official Statistics: Preference utilisation of UK trade in goods, 2021
items.summary: Statistics on UK utilisation of tariff preferences for imports and exports under PTAs for 2021, including trade in goods between Great Britain and the EU under the TCA.

items.title: Policy paper: UK support to Ukraine: factsheet
items.summary: This factsheet summarises how the UK is supporting Ukraine following the Russian invasion.

items.title: Corporate report: DESNZ: framework documents
items.summary: Information about how the Department for Energy Security and Net Zero (DESNZ) works with its public bodies.

items.title: Corporate report: Ofgem framework document
items.summary: This framework agreement is between the Department for Energy Security and Net Zero and Ofgem.

items.title: Standard: UK Low Carbon Hydrogen Standard
items.summary: The UK Low Carbon Hydrogen Standard for hydrogen producers to use for greenhouse gas emissions reporting, including a calculator tool.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notices: anti-dumping duty on glass fibre products from China
items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for International Trade relating to the anti-dumping duty on glass fibre products from China.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notices: countervailing duty on glass fibre products from China
items.summary: Trade remedies notices published by the Secretary of State for International Trade relating to the countervailing duty on glass fibre products from China.

items.title: Decision: UK-Andean countries committee documents
items.summary: Decisions, documents and meeting minutes from UK-Andean countries committees.

items.title: Research: Ambient gamma radiation dose rates across the UK
items.summary: Data received from fixed and mobile monitors measuring the ambient (background) gamma radiation dose rate across the UK.

items.title: New UK-US partnership to drive investment and bolster critical minerals supply chains
items.summary: The UK and US have signed a Memorandum of Understanding on critical minerals in Washington DC.

items.title: UK and US sign Memorandum of Understanding on critical minerals
items.summary: The UK and US signed a Memorandum of Understanding on critical minerals in Washington DC on 4 February.

items.title: Make Work Pay: strengthening the law on tipping
items.summary: We are seeking views on strengthening the law on tipping.

items.title: Make Work Pay: improving access to flexible working
items.summary: We are seeking views on a new process for employers to follow when handling flexible working requests, as well as insights on flexible working practices more broadly.

items.title: Notice: Feed-in Tariffs: 2026 modification to the standard conditions of electricity supply licences
items.summary: The Secretary of State is making modifications to the standard conditions of electricity supply licences.

items.title: Notice: Trade remedies notice: registration of imports of creamy/white limestone originating from Portugal
items.summary: Trade remedies notice published by the Secretary of State for Business and Trade relating to the registration of imports of creamy/white limestone from Portugal.

items.title: Secretary of State keynote: UK Trade and Export Finance Forum
items.summary: Speech delivered by the Business Secretary, the RT Hon Peter Kyle, at the 2026 UK Trade and Export Finance Forum.

items.title: Andy King appointed as Regulator of Community Interest Companies
items.summary: Business Secretary Peter Kyle confirms Andy King as CIC Regulator.

items.title: Notice: CCUS East Coast Cluster: Teesside selection process
items.summary: Apply to take part in the ECC Teesside selection process for projects seeking connection to the Teesside network by 2032.

items.title: Carbon capture, usage and storage (CCUS): non-pipeline transport
items.summary: We're seeking views on policy proposals to support the deployment of domestic non-pipeline transport (NPT) projects.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Final UK greenhouse gas emissions statistics: 1990 to 2024
items.summary: Final estimates of UK territorial greenhouse gas emissions.

items.title: UK exporters boost economy, as new study reveals major impact of export credit on UK industry
items.summary: Oxford Economics study demonstrates the significant impact of UKEF's support on businesses and local supply chains.

items.title: UK Trade Tariff: duty suspensions and autonomous tariff quotas
items.summary: Temporary duty suspensions and autonomous tariff quotas (ATQs) for importing goods into the UK.

items.title: Clean energy upgrades for hospitals and military sites
items.summary: £74 million for clean energy upgrades to cut bills for public buildings and create savings for frontline services.

items.title: Make Work Pay: fire and rehire – changes to expenses, benefits, and shift patterns
items.summary: We're seeking views on 2 proposed changes to fire and rehire protections in relation to benefits and expenses, and to shift patterns.

items.title: Notice: Apply for the Heat Network Efficiency Scheme (HNES): Round 11
items.summary: The Heat Network Efficiency Scheme supports performance improvements to existing district heating or communal heating projects.

items.title: Clean energy funding to be tied to stronger workers’ rights
items.summary: Offshore wind firms must sign up to a ‘Fair Work Charter’ to participate in government renewables auctions.

items.title: Notice: Heat Pump Ready Programme
items.summary: The programme supports the development and demonstration of heat pump technologies and tools, and solutions for optimised deployment of heat pumps.

items.title: UK and Europe sign historic pact to drive clean energy future
items.summary: Energy Secretary Ed Miliband signs a historic clean energy security pact.

items.title: Notice: Building the North Seas’ power hub for a resilient and competitive Europe: North Sea Summit declarations 2026
items.summary: Declarations between the UK and North Seas countries at the 3rd North Sea Summit, Hamburg, Germany, January 2026.

items.title: Policy paper: Civil nuclear fuel use: statement
items.summary: Statement outlining the UK Government’s guiding principles for civil nuclear fuel use to support energy security, new reactor deployment, and long‑term planning.

items.title: Guidance: Advanced nuclear pipeline: how to apply
items.summary: How to apply to the United Kingdom Advanced Nuclear Pipeline for advanced nuclear projects.

items.title: Policy paper: Advanced Nuclear Technologies
items.summary: Information about Advanced Nuclear Technologies, previously known as Small Modular Reactors.

items.title: Policy paper: Advanced nuclear framework
items.summary: This Framework is designed to support the development, commercialisation and deployment of private innovative nuclear projects within the UK energy system.
